description: Teana was raised by her older brother through most of her childhood up to his death. Because of a mission in which her brother had failed to apprehend a wanted mage, the Lanster name was shamed and Teana made efforts to redeem herself and her dead brother throughout her time at the academy. She was assigned into the Stars squad under the TSAB Mobile Section Six with Subaru Nakajima. She is armed with the intelligent device Cross Mirage.
name: Teana Lanster
